title: When I press on the cover of the phone, a creak appears.
content:
Hello!
I can't find any way to contact support, after clicking on link contact us, only pointless redirect happens.
My problem: When I press on the cover of the phone, a creak appears. It seems to me that the back cover is starting to peel off.
The phone was ordered to Russia from an online store in Germany.
How can I get warranty support? 
I'm a little scared to keep my phone in my pocket after reading posts on reddit.
